Title: Extends the timeframe for motor vehicle inspections for new motor vehicles sold within the state
Summary: Extends the timeframe for motor vehicle inspections for new motor vehicles sold within the state to five years from the date of sale.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to extending the timeframe for motor vehicle inspections for new motor vehicles sold within the state
